func.title: GetPlayerTeam

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player whose team you want to determine.

func.desc: Returns the team number of a player. If the player is not in a team, 0 is returned.
func.remark:
This function was deprecated in 9.0 OC, because it can be retrieved from GetPlayer by calling GetTeam.
Teams SetPlayerTeam
